entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
